website_summaries.verdict: For kids who like to collect the different Paw Patrol characters and their racers, this is a great set. Three for the price also makes it a good deal.
pros: A cute trio that includes brightly colored, detailed characters Skye, Chase, and Marshall
cons: Characters can't be removed from vehicles
Some reports of wheels not moving smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Toy NOT as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Items inside box are not what are pictured on outside of box! Feels like a scam. Lights of fire engine weren't pained (just left silver), Chace's car is green and blue (when it is shown as white and blue), and Sky is a head only, not turned sideways as in picture, and there is not moving flap on her helicopter when picture details movement. Would rather have spent more over time for better toys (I've seen removable ones that are sold separately) and would have if this toy had not been so badly misrepresented. It looks like they took pictures of the more expensive (better crafted) toys and used them on box.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: and the one I received looks like it's been returned before
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I was expecting for the price, and the one I received looks like it's been returned before. It had large dirty sticky patches on both sides of the box where lables have been removed and some other wear on the box that was not caused by shipping. Edited to add, the inside is even worse. The figures look like cheap knockoffs of the ones on the box. Hardly any detail in the paint, and the front wheel on Skye's vehicle doesn't even function, it's cast as a solid piece. The propeller doesn't spin when you push it as is implied.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Watch the Price
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the price changes SOOO much for these. I bought them for 24$ and now they are $11?!?! Since I paid 24$, that's what I'm reviewing them for. As for quality, definitely not worth that price. More appropriate for a 10$ item (so if its this price listed, its fine). The pups do not come out of the car (which I knew before from reading product reviews). Sky's helicopter is hard to roll on the floor because the front wheel is plastic and does not spin. Not worth the 24$, but okay for 11$. Kids like them, which is why it gets 3/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: The products are fake
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the characters for my grandson and had them shipped directly to him. My daughter texted me the following list of problems: The paint job on the characters does not match what is shown on the box. The headlights of the vehicles were not painted. The tires on the vehicles were flat and not ridged. Skye's wing do not open. I have gotten stung with knock-offs before and appear to be taken advantage of once again. I've learned my lesson and won't buy toys on Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Kadis

customer_reviews.title: Love Paw Patrol!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to be so excited when she opens this gift! Now it just means I need to collect the rest of them though! Lol The downside is that both packs come with Skye, which I don't need two of Skye. That's not really fair that I'd have to have double to complete the set. I like that the characters are inside the vehicles (not able to be taken out) because then I won't have to keep track of where they go, which vehicle they are supposed to go in, etc. I love that it is the vehicles that go inside the Paw Patroller which I'm sure will be the next gift she asks for for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Friend

customer_reviews.title: Not as it appears
customer_reviews.text: The images for these items is not right. It shows a front wheel on Skye's car that had traction and is attached by a small black pin. It also shows the side wings opening. None of this is correct. The front wheel on Skye's vehicle is fake and makes it so she gets stuck going down slides. Getting a better version of this toy was the entire reason we made this purchase. We were greatly disappointed by the deception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: I used these as cake toppers for my son's 4th bday. They're a cute palm size that's just right for that purpose. While the characters are not removable and so they get played with less than his full sized PP pups and cars, they fit the need and are still enjoyed on occasion. I think they'd also be great for a younger child (who does not put things in their mouth) bc they'd be just the size for little hands to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harris

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Pictures on box do not match item inside. Poor quality. I believe this item is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: The kids really enjoy these, both boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: The kids really enjoy these, both boys and girls. The toys actually roll really well, or at least much better than I expected. It's no fun when kids have to sit very close together to play cars because they wont roll. These have no problem clearing the entire span of a large room with tile/wood flooring or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Probably a good gift for collectors but for kids it’s the worst gift, kids get frustrated because Chase and friends couldn’t get out of cars, kids tried to pull them out but they are part of the cars. Also, it’s very pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Lgi

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys
customer_reviews.text: My great nephews loves Paws Patrols and even one know the names of individuals. They always enjoy to play with Paw Patrols and this is for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Wimpy Charley

customer_reviews.title: A BIG hit with my granddaughters!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters absolutely LOVED these toys. The ONLY criticism I have is that the characters do not come out of the vehicles. They are all one unit. I thought they were removable so the children could play with them separately or together. On the plus side, they were a little larger than I anticipated, so that was nice. :D
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great toy from Paw Patrol
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest little toy from paw patrol. They are very sturdy and they are made of hard plastic which is good since my daughter loves to send them into the wall. The characters do not come out of the cars and I had to explain that to my daughter a few times before she finally gave up on trying to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSurvey365

customer_reviews.title: Super low quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the smaller low quality versions. Do not buy.... Spend a few bucks more and get the higher quality... There is a noticable difference... Function, moving parts, art.
customer_reviews.author: N+B+O

customer_reviews.title: Durable cars that kids loved
customer_reviews.text: Gift for three grandkids. The live Paw Patrol so really loved these little vehicles. I liked that the characters don’t come out because the twins are not quite two years old yet. No choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: CLT from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun but stationary
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these. The package contains three of the most popular Paw Patrol characters. Note: characters are stationary in their vehicles and cannot be removed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality toy
customer_reviews.text: toy of excellent quality, very strong and durable material, I accidentally stepped on it with a car wheel, and I only got a scratch from it, my son likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Fausto Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: My kids really love Paw Patrol and we were excited to get them ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love Paw Patrol and we were excited to get them these toys for Christmas. While they love playing with them after 3 months they are falling apart. My kids aren't rough with their toys but these haven't held up as well as other toys. I would recommend these toys if your kidd like Paw Patrol but don't expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G

customer_reviews.title: Puppies are not removable!
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. The little dogs rescuers are stationary, can not be taken out. There is no mentioning for that. I still need to buy more better than this which I can take out the puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my three year old on his birthday. He was ecstatic when opening the gift. I was pleased with the size of the toys. They were big enough to push around the floor but small enough for him to carry all three when he is walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Nee

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Good price! These things are expensive. The little one loved it and it was very durable
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Skye- know what you are getting
customer_reviews.text: Chase and Marshall were great. My grandson loved rolling the cars all over the house. Skye was a dud. The front wheel is stationary and the back 2 wheels roll. Makes no sense as it will not roll with the front wheel stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: Love how they all come together in this pack definitely cheaper than buying separate. My daughter loves them and they are the perfect size for a toddlers hand!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys!
customer_reviews.text: Kids like them, but the love the bigger ones where the pups come out of the vehicles better.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: 3-year old boy approved
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, which is quite perfect for a 3-year old boy who enjoys destruction...😪
customer_reviews.author: LinM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived destroyed so had to remove vehicles. Wheels did not turn, really a waste to buy this set.gave to our 4 year old grandson on his birthday but they didn’t do anything.he couldn’t play with them. Very disappointing. Not much fun to just look at them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: In fact the toys themselves only fill like 1/3 of the box they come in
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. Much smaller than you would expect. In fact the toys themselves only fill like 1/3 of the box they come in. They don’t really do anything. My son loves them but for the price I feel they a cheap and too small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Dayna Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toys. Durable and lasted a while even after multiple throws against walls.
customer_reviews.author: Weewillowmom

customer_reviews.title: These Paw Patrol racers are single entities.
customer_reviews.text: These Paw Patrol characters are fused into their vehicles. They remind me of Happy meals toys from the 1980's. Sometimes its better to go to a toy store in order to determine what is actually in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Louise K

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my son on his 3rd birthday and he liked it so much! Nice addition to his Paw patrol collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 3 and loves these things! I love that the guys can’t be removed from the cars. Fun and safe!
customer_reviews.author: kristina s.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves Paw Patrol so I ordered the rescue racers for Christmas. He loves them. They are one of his favorite gifts this year. It was basically like three gifts in one. I recommend this product for any young child that likes Paw Patrol.
customer_reviews.author: C Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Puppies are not seperate to the cars
customer_reviews.text: The puppies are not removable or seperate to the cars

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, well constructed and the kids loved them. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Only for toddlers at best.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the ones where the animals come out. My mistake, so my kids still got them as gifts, but they are not their favorites by far. My 1.5 year old is somewhat interested in them, but my 4 year old never plays with them. Spend the money on the better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: I think she will really love these. I also like that it's not the ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves Paw Patrol. I think she will really love these. I also like that it's not the typical toy for a girl but I know she will have so much fun with them! I also really like that the come in a three set for even more fun play time! I think the quailty Is very nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: J-jangles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the Paw Patrol and they were sold out everywhere for Christmas . I found them here same price as Walmart so that was a plus . They are perfect size for my son and I love that the wheels actually move on them . We are definitly happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these characters. He has been having a lot of fun playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: GGMarceaux

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the pink one.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Paw Patrol. Marshal and Chase are his favorite, and those two cars are excellent. The pink toy the front wheel doesn't spin so it doesn't moves as well as the other two. Also, while pictured as pink and white, the actual toy is pink and gray.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite show is paw patrol and in the store just ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the size they were bigger than I expected I can't wait for my granddaughter to open them on Christmas. Her favorite show is paw patrol and in the store just 1 of the characters cost the same as what I got all three of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol to the Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these! He is constantly playing with them and they are holding up great! No breakage!! The price I got them at here on Amazon beat every place I went to. Colorful! Kid Friendly! Paw Patrol! What more can a toddler want!
customer_reviews.author: mphoto

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well made and size was as expected. Our son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons GF's little boy who loves Paw Patrol. My son said he will love them come Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The characters do not come out and the vehicles hardly drive.
customer_reviews.author: Kordo

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: My twins absolutely lover Paw Patrol. We purchased the paw patroller big 18-wheeler vechicle, and these are the perfect size to fit in it. I also like that you can't take the paw patrol characters in and out of the vehicle. One less thing to get lost. My twins love making the cars race back and forth, and pretending like Skye is flying through the air. They are easy for them to hold in their tiny hands as well. They also enjoying rolling these little cars down their slide outside. This product is also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: TINY!!
customer_reviews.text: More than half of the box was taken up by cardboard as a filler.
customer_reviews.author: LMC14

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as pictured, but it was pretty close (the colors were just off a bit). Looks cute! Small and only takes up half of the larger box. Good gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for imagination playing too!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Paw Patrol cars! I bought them for my 3 year old granddaughter and she has fun pushing them around. They look like the characters.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trabbold

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved these, and they worked really well as cake ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these, and they worked really well as cake decorators for a birthday party. Functioned as decorations, and doubled as a toy to take home. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Letterman

customer_reviews.title: Paw patrols.. can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Paw patrols, how can you go wrong... They are pretty simple little toys that act like a car..my boys loved them and they are still in one piece.. so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yolish

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the size we need.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but too small for Paw Patroller. The characters are not removable from vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Mommac

customer_reviews.title: Great quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: Great quality plastic, very tough even through rough play. Packaged well and easy to gift wrap. I purchased three different sets and they are all equally just as good.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this set of Paw Patrol vehicles for my son who is 4. First of all this set is much better value and quality than any of the other vehicles you could purchase from Walmart or Target. The large size of the cars make it easier for little hands to grap. The wheels so far dont squeak like most of his plastic cars, and it glides across the floor so easily. I could not ask for a better value or toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Paw Patroller!
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift to go along with my sons Paw Patroller. They do fit inside. My two year old didn't say a thing about the pups not coming out of their vehicle but my 4 year old nephew did ask why the pups didn't come out but he still loves them! I (as mom) am happy they don't come out, in the Christmas mess we would have lost a few. We have the Ryder that comes off his ATV and he is constantly asking where Ryder is, I can imagine what it would be like if they all did!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Richard

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and I found out it was smaller than I thought, but the kid was happy anyway.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for imagination
customer_reviews.text: Paw Patrol toys are the perfect size for little hands and big imagination.

customer_reviews.title: really cute toys
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my friends daughter. She loves them and rolls them down her hallway everyday. They are small but not too small, and they roll great and are cute little toys if you like paw patrol.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my nephew. He has had a lot of fun with these.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my nephew as a gift and he loved them!!

customer_reviews.title: Paw patrol
customer_reviews.text: Great product was as descibed by seller. The right size for a wide range of children both boys and girls. Good quality . arived on time and undamged . I would recommend these to anyone searching for a Paw Patrol gift for a child 3 +
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed the figures do not come out of the vehicle. They are fine for very young hidden, but a little older children like to play with the characters outside the vehicle.

customer_reviews.title: My son approves who am i to argue

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product

customer_reviews.title: the moment he saw these he fell in love with them

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These little cars are some of my son's favorite Christmas gifts! I like that they are all in one piece, so there's no parts or characters to use. He is loving playing with them, and they hold up well even to rough play.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my 2 year old and they were just the right size. Not too small and not too big. He loves Paw Patrol right now so he is playing with them everyday.

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old is OBSESSED with Paw Patrol and she was very excited to get these for Christmas! They are easy to roll on the floor and you can roll them pretty far. I specifically like that you can't take the dogs out of the cars so she can't lose them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We both like Paw Patrol Figures, he's 3 and I'm 56 years of age.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old grandson loves these characters and will sit and play with them for hours. They're actually pretty positive role models and I enjoy them to.

customer_reviews.title: Bought both sets and a bit disappointed that at least one set didn't have Everest or ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought both sets and a bit disappointed that at least one set didn't have Everest or Zuma! I don't know why both sets had Sky. I wanted Sky of course but now we have two of her.

customer_reviews.title: Opened up the package and the box looked like it had been played catch with for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member for Christmas. Opened up the package and the box looked like it had been played catch with for a couple hours. Unfortunately I do not have enough time to return and rebuy it so I had to apologize in advance to his father for the poor quality of the product. Very disappointed.

product_meta.title: Paw Patrol Racers 3-Pack Vehicle Set, Rescue Marshall, Spy Chase, and Skye
product_meta.description: Style:Marshall,Chase & SkyeRace to the ruff-ruff rescue with Paw Patrol Rescue Racers 3-pack! With real working wheels, Chase, Marshall and Skye race into action. Cruise with the Paw Patrol by collecting all of the Paw Patrol Racers. Together, your child's imagination will be lit up with pup inspired rescue missions full of friendship, teamwork and bravery. No job is too big and no pup is too small. Race to the ruff-ruff rescue with Paw Patrol Racers!.
feature_bullets: Paw Patrol Racers have real working wheels so you can race to the ruff-ruff rescue with your favorite pups!
